thread.title: WTF | Watch: 80-year-old couple recreate 'Up' to celebrate their 60th anniversary
thread.title_full: WTF | Watch: 80-year-old couple recreate 'Up' to celebrate their 60th anniversary - entertainment.ie

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: WTF | Watch: 80-year-old couple recreate 'Up' to celebrate their 60th anniversary
text:
Thankfully this has a far happier ending than the movie which is probably one of the most emotionally traumatic cinematic events of the last ten years.
The 80-year-old grandparents of Jason Lyle Black, a YouTuber/pianist, celebrated 60 years of marriage recently by recreating scenes from Pixar's 'Up' while playing a duet of the movie's theme song on the piano and god damn it if it isn't the sweetest thing you'll see today.
Via Mashable
